name: One Night at Gru's PC Port
name_original: One Night at Gru's PC Port
description:
STORY

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

After disrespecting Gru`s favourite game Roblox, he decided to get revenge, so he kidnapped you to his lair and force you to play his game. Will you survive until 6 AM? Or get farted by Gru and his friends. Good luck!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                 CONTROLS

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    Space for flashlight                Mouse for most things                        

                                     F to fart

                                  (use wisely)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is a meme game

(Click on the info button before commenting)
